titles.title: To require the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to return to the cost-based regulation of wholesale interstate sales of electricity, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 1/30/2001--Introduced. Instructs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) to regulate rates and charges for (wholesale interstate) electric energy sales within its jurisdiction on the same (cost) basis as they were regulated prior to issuance of specified FERC orders on April 24, 1996.
